frontmatter.title: Enrichment and Identification of Neural Stem Cells in Neurospheres Using Rigidity-Tunable Gels
frontmatter.description: Neural stem cells (NCSs) are integral to establishing in vitro models and regenerative medicine. To this day, there is an unmet need to enrich these cells from a heterogeneous cell population for clinical applications without irreversible manipulation. We identified a method to propagate human NCSs via computational analysis of their mechanical signature.
